name: ts
description: There is an infinite array of integers numbered consecutively from 0. At each step, a pointer can move from index i to index i + j, or remain where it is. The value of i begins at 0. The value of j begins at 1 and at each step, j increments by 1. There is one known index that must be avoided. Determine the highest index that can be reached in a given number of steps.
